column2: "Na banyin no nye ne yer Eve dae na onyinsenii; na ɔwoo Kain
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Medze EWURADZE no mboa enya banyin."

column2: "Na ɔwoo babanyin bio na ɔfrɛɛ no Abel. Nna Abel yɛɛ oguanhwɛfo
column3: na Kain dze okuafo a."

column2: "Nda guu mu no
column3: ɔbaa dɛ Kain dze ekuadze bɔbɔɔ EWURADZE afɔr
column5: "na Abel so dze no nguan mu mbakan na dza wɔadodɔ seradze no mu bi bae. Na EWURADZE n'enyi sɔɔ Abel nye n'afɔrbɔ:"

column2: "na Kain nye n'afɔrbɔ dze n'enyi annsɔ. Na Kain no bo fuuw kɛsenara
column3: na omunae."

column2: "Na EWURADZE bisaa Kain dɛ
column3: ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na wo bo efuw yi? Na ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na emuna yi?"

column2: "Sɛ eyɛɛ papa a nkyɛ w'enyim nnkɛba nyam? Na dɛ annyɛ papa ntsi
column3: bɔn kotow w'abowano rohwehwɛ w'ekyir kwan naaso ɔwɔ dɛ ehyɛ wo ho do."

column2: "Na Kain kaa kyerɛɛ no nua Abel dɛ ɔmma wɔnkɔ haban mu. Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔwɔ hamu no
column3: Kain soɛɛr no nua Abel do

column2: "Na EWURADZE bisaa Kain dɛ
column3: Wo nua Abel wɔ hen? Na Kain buaa dɛ
column4: Minnyim: ana emi nye mo nua no hwɛdofo?"

column2: "Na EWURADZE see no dɛ
column3: Ebɛnadze na ayɛ yi? Wo nua no bɔgyaa ne ndze fi famu keka mu frɛ me."

column2: "Na afei wofi asaase a ɔahan n'anomu regye wo nua no bɔgyaa wɔ wo nsamu no do wɔadom wo:"
"Ofi ndɛ kɔ yi
column3: sɛ edɔw asaase a
column4: onnkeyi no ndɔbaa ama wo; na afei so ɔkobɔfo nye okyimakyimafo na ebɛyɛ wɔ asaase do."

column2: "Na Kain see EWURADZE dɛ
column3: Mo bɔn ho akatua so kyɛn dɛ mubotum asoa."

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: ndɛ eyi me edzi wɔ asaase yi do; na mubosuma efi w'enyim; na mebɛyɛ kobɔfo nye kyimakyimafo wɔ asaase do; na ɔbɛba dɛ
column4: obiara a obohu me no oboku me."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see no dɛ wonnkoku wo
column3: osiandɛ obiara a oboku Kain no wobedzi no wer mpɛn esuon. Na EWURADZE yɛɛ asɛnkyerɛdze bi maa Kain

column2: "Na Kain fii EWURADZE n'enyim kɔree
column3: na ɔkɛtsenaa Nod asaase do wɔ Eden no boka."

column2: "Na Kain nye ne yer dae: na onyinsenii
column3: na ɔwoo Enok: na ɔkyekyeer kurow
column4: na ɔfrɛɛ kurow no ne dzin Enok
column5: dɛ mbrɛ ne ba no ne dzin tse."

column2: "Na Enok woo Irad; na Irad woo Mehujael: na Mehujael woo Metusael: na Metusael woo Lamek."
"Na Lamek waar yernom beenu: baako ne dzin dze Ada
column3: na baako so ne dzin dze Zila."

column2: "Na Ada woo Jabal: ɔno nye hɔn a wɔtsena asese mu na wɔwɔ fiembowa no
column3: hɔn egya."

column2: "Na no nua no dzin dze Jubal: ɔno nye asankubɔfo nye mbɛnhɛmfo nyinara hɔn egya."
"Na Zila
column3: so woo Tubal-kain a ɔton kɔɔber nye dadze ndzɛmba a wɔdze twa adze nyinara no; na Tubal-kain n'akyerɛbaa nye Naama."

column2: "Na Lamek see ne yernom dɛ: Hom ntsie me ndze
column3: Ada nye Zila; Hom nyɛ aso mma me kasaa
column4: Lamek yernom: Na meku ɔbarimba dɛ opiraa me
column5: Na meku aberantsɛ dɛ ɔboor me
column7: "Sɛ wobedzi Kain ho wer mpɛn esuon a

column2: "Na Adam nye ne yer daa bio; na ɔwoo babanyin
column3: na ɔtoo no dzin Set: Na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Nyankopɔn dze ba fofor ahyɛ me Abel n'ananmu; osiandɛ Kain kum no."

column2: "Na Set so
column3: wɔwoo babanyin maa no; na ɔtoo no dzin Enos: nna afei adasa hyɛɛ ase bɔɔ EWURADZE ne dzin sɔɔr no."
